name: | GENERIC | DUNGEON | Version 0.5 (ALPHA)
description:
Generic Dungeon ported to itch.io from Scratch (yes I had to turn the .sb3 into an HTML, it took a while to find a website and I probably should've used Turbowarp)

Controls (Mobile not supported, that's for later):

WASD to move

Spacebar to attack

E to roll (you gain invulnerability as long as you're rolling)

| GENERIC | DUNGEON | is a roguelike dungeon crawler where you find your way toward the King's room and defeat him. If you die on the way there, you start all over. So yeah, you don't want to die.

Hello, Agent. You have intruded the Generic Dungeon, where the generics capture and imprison their enemies and traitors. Your mission is simple. Kill all the guards and free the prisoners. However, there are many dangers placed by the King. The King also knows about your mission, so don't expect this to be easy.

NOTE: This game is in Alpha. Expect to see a lot of unfairness and bugs. If you do have any suggestions, feel free to comment them!

Inspiration from Enter the Gungeon

Will_Wam for text engine

Most music is from Terraria Calamity Mod

Game over music is Undertale OST 011
